Know this  Dr PERIOD Puja Uppal Family Medicine PERIOD

Beyond the News Since the findings of this study observed that minorities and people of color bear the disproportionate impact of unmanaged dementia risk factors its important to address disparities in healthcare access quality and outcomes among minority groups PERIOD



Key Drivers in Falls Church County

A new study published in PLOS ONE examined data from over  people PERIOD The data showed that there were significant differences in dementia risk and age on onset among different ethnic groups PERIOD

The data showed that generally manageable risk factors like hypertension obesity diabetes HDL cholesterol levels and sleep disorders have an even greater impact on dementia likelihood for minority groups when compared to White people PERIOD

Takeaway 

What theyre saying  Study Source



Health Standard Newswire Modifying certain risk facts can dramatically lower your chances of getting dementia especially for people of color PERIOD

All of these variables above play an important role in the outcomes of your overall health PERIOD

The Health Standard Newswire
